title: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park: Fee Information
body: Fee Information         US Fee Area Logo   If you are scheduling a field trip, here is some information concerning FEES at Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park. Point Park on top of Lookout Mountain is the only Designated Fee Area located within Chickamauga and Chattanooga NMP. The fee is $5.00 per adult (age 16 or older). Children 15 years or younger are free. However, the park offers a fee waiver for educational institutions. School groups may recieve a fee waiver if you make reservations at least two weeks prior to your visit.   A fee waiver application must be sumitted along with a letter of request on institution letterhead requesting and explaining reasons for the educational visit that are relevant to the parks purpose. Talks or guided tours must be reserved in advance and are subject to available staff. Fee Waiver Requests click here.
